files.patch:
@@ -13,10 +13,2 @@
-  test:
-    name: "Test ${{ matrix.os }}"
-    strategy:
-      fail-fast: false
-      max-parallel: 3
-      matrix:
-        os: [ ubuntu-latest, macos-latest, windows-latest ]
-
-    runs-on: ${{ matrix.os }}
-
+  linux-test:
+    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
@@ -24,25 +16,2 @@
-    - name: '[Windows] Install Cygwin'
-      if: runner.os == 'Windows'
-      uses: cygwin/cygwin-install-action@v2
-      with:
-        packages: >-
-          rsync
-          wget
-    - name: '[Windows] Configure Git'
-      if: runner.os == 'Windows'
-      run: git config --global core.autocrlf input
-
-    - name: 'Check out repository'
-      uses: actions/checkout@v3
-      with:
-        fetch-depth: 1
-
-    - name: 'Set up JDK 11'
-      uses: actions/setup-java@v3
-      with:
-       distribution: 'temurin'
-       java-version: 11
-      
-    - name: 'Build JTReg'
-      shell: bash
-      run: bash make/build.sh --jdk ${JAVA_HOME}
+    - name: 'Build'
+      uses: ./.github/actions/build
@@ -50,14 +19,14 @@
-    - name: 'Run initial tests (goal: quick-test)'
-      shell: bash
-      env:
-        MAKE_ARGS: quick-test
-        HEADLESS: 1
-      run: bash make/build.sh --jdk ${JAVA_HOME} --skip-download
-
-    - name: 'Run all tests (goal: test)'
-      if: false
-      shell: bash
-      env:
-        MAKE_ARGS: test
-        HEADLESS: 1
-      run: bash make/build.sh --jdk ${JAVA_HOME} --skip-download
+  mac-test:
+    runs-on: macos-latest
+    steps:
+    - name: 'Build'
+      uses: ./.github/actions/build
+
+  windows-test:
+    runs-on: windows-latest
+    defaults:
+      run:
+        shell: C:\cygwin\bin\bash.exe --noprofile --norc -o igncr -eo pipefail '{0}'
+    steps:
+    - name: 'Build'
+      uses: ./.github/actions/build
